summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of North Broadway, from Allison Street to a connection with the existing pavement on Fuhrman Avenue. by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 88889, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
